overview: The tallest babe in this set is 5'4, weighing in at 91 pounds. We try to pair them with a much bigger partner as is the case with Tiffany Thompson and Layla Rose. Tiffany, with her very long legs, measures in at 5'9" while Layla is a solid 5'0. Amazing things do come in small packages. And don't forget Aubrey Belle at 5'2 with Nina measuring in at 5'10.
title: ATK Petites 4
